instruction.text: Create slide with the title 'NLP Can Answer Questions' in large, bolded font in the top center of the page. Below it, use the provided screenshot of the google search result of the question 'Where was the first movie theater in the U.S?' in the middle of the page.

Create slide with the title 'NLP Can Answer Questions' in large, bolded font in the top center of the page. Below it, put a screenshot of the google search result of the question 'Where was the first movie theater in the U.S?' in the middle of the page.
Create a slide with the Title 'NLP Can Answer Questions' and put a screenshot of the google search result of the question 'Where was the first movie theater in the U.S?' in the middle of the page.

program.text:
from pptx import Presentation
from pptx.util import Inches, Pt

presentation = Presentation()
presentation.slide_width = Inches(16)
presentation.slide_height = Inches(9)

slide_layout = presentation.slide_layouts[0] # choose a layout template
slide = presentation.slides.add_slide(slide_layout)

# add text title
text = "NLP Can Answer Questions"
text_box = slide.shapes.add_textbox(Inches(1), Inches(0.5), Inches(8), Inches(1))
lines = text.split("\n")
adjusted_height = len(lines)  # Adjust height based on the number of lines
text_box.height = Inches(adjusted_height)
text_box.text_frame.word_wrap = True

p = text_box.text_frame.add_paragraph()
p.text = text
p.font.size = Pt(36)

# insert google search screenshot
image_path = "screenshot.png"
slide.shapes.add_picture(image_path, Inches(2.5), Inches(2), Inches(6), Inches(4))

presentation.save("target_path.pptx")

from pptx import Presentation
from pptx.util import Inches, Pt
from library import add_text, google_search_screenshot, add_image

presentation = Presentation()

presentation.slide_height = Inches(9)

program.text:
from pptx import Presentation
from pptx.util import Inches, Pt

presentation = Presentation()
presentation.slide_width = Inches(16)
presentation.slide_height = Inches(9)

slide_layout = presentation.slide_layouts[5] # choose a layout template
slide = presentation.slides.add_slide(slide_layout)

# add text title
text = "Interior Design"
text_box = slide.shapes.add_textbox(Inches(1), Inches(0.5), Inches(8), Inches(1))
lines = text.split("\n")
adjusted_height = len(lines)  # Adjust height based on the number of lines
text_box.height = Inches(adjusted_height)
text_box.bold = True
text_box.text_frame.word_wrap = True

p = text_box.text_frame.add_paragraph()
p.text = text
p.font.size = Pt(48)

# insert google search screenshot
image_path = "colorful.png"
slide.shapes.add_picture(image_path, Inches(0), Inches(0), Inches(16), Inches(9))

presentation.save("path.pptx")
